welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sao Paulo, a vibrant city known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and bustling nightlife. We invite you to explore its charming neighborhoods and immerse yourself in the unique energy of this amazing city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Congonhas International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Congonhas International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal, used for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal, used for international flights.

wifi.note: The wifi is free for the first 1 hour, after which a fee may apply.
